QueryResult.text: SELECT id object_instance_id, reported_by user_id FROM imm_incidents UNION SELECT id object_instance_id, assigned_to user_id FROM imm_incidents UNION SELECT id object_instance_id, assigned_prjmgr_id user_id FROM imm_incidents UNION SELECT incidents.id object_instance_id, instance.user_id user_id FROM cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 instance, imm_incidents incidents WHERE instance.object_id = 50781 and instance.permission_code = 'WRITE' and instance.object_instance_id = incidents.category_id
